description: A quilted impact vest in silt-olive with scarred quilting from hard use

core:description.text: A padded vest of quilted linen dyed the dull silt-olive of riverbed mud. The arms are left free for unrestricted movement during extraction work. The quilting is dense and well-stuffed, designed to absorb the shock of falling debris and glancing blows from swinging cargo. Deep scars cross the fabric where sharp edges have torn through, each one a close call remembered.
